summary: This bill, the "Eliminating the RFS and Its Destructive Outcomes Act," aims to repeal the renewable fuel program (RFS) established under the Clean Air Act. It repeals Section 211(o) of the Clean Air Act and makes conforming amendments to other sections within the Clean Air Act and the Petroleum Marketing Practices Act. The legislation was introduced in the House of Representatives on March 27, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
